original_title: Charlotte Cross: An Evil Queen Is Born
overview: Don't let the sweet face fool you. She may have started out as a submissive but Charlotte Cross soon discovered her true nature as a Domme. Wielding her favorite BDSM toys, strap-on, straitjacket and a very perverted mind, she puts her lucky victims through an experience they'll never forget.
title: Charlotte Cross: An Evil Queen Is Born
